title: Min and rec tech specs to run the game?
body:
Going to be gone for a while and need a cheap laptop to feed my addiction.  Already have a desktop a wee bit overbuilt for league as it is, so im just looking for suggestions on the cheapest laptop that will reliably run league for 6-9 months. Or the min and mid specs i should be looking for.

Not sure if this is the right board, thank you in advance for all help and input.

replies.body: Hey there, I couldn't make a specific decision for you but I can help lead you the right way!  Bookmark our[ minimum/recommended specs](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752654-Minimum-and-Recommended-System-Requirements) guide, which should help you find what you're looking for!
